greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total sum of parts of multiplicity 3 in all partitions of n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
formula: a(n) ~ 7 * sqrt(3) * exp(Pi*sqrt(2*n/3)) / (288 * Pi^2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 29 2018
mathematica: b[n_, p_] := b[n, p] = If[n == 0 && p == 0, {1, 0}, If[p == 0, Array[0&, n+2], Sum[Function[l, ReplacePart[l, m+2 -> p*l[[1]] + l[[m+2]]]][Join[b[n-p*m, p-1], Array[0&, p*m]]], {m, 0, n/p}]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n][[5]]; Table[a[n], {n, 3, 50}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 24 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 03 2013
